review: I got this for only $20 during its introductory launch. However, even at its current price it is a worthwhile investment for subscribers of Amazon Prime.This is an Amazing addition to watch included and additional premium content. The Interface is as nice as Apple TVs and the device is compatible with my Logitech Harmony Smart Control so although I don't use its remote, its decent and as functional as Apple TVs.I have watched several movies already and I must say the streaming quality is excellent: 1080p and HD audio. My only 2 complaints are not really about this device but:1) As far as Amazon rental/purchase pricing goes, is that it seems that taxes for this content is well in excess of 10%2) Not 100% of the available content has Previews or is available to watch using this dongle
